question: Which among the following organisation of the World Bank Group is not a specialised agency of the United Nations?
option2: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development
explanation: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD), International Finance Corporation (IFC) and International Development Association (IDA) are Specialized Agencies of the UN while International Centre for Settlement of Investment Disputes ICSID and Multilateral Investment Guarantee Agency MIGA are not Specialized Agencies.
